Description: Fragment of parchment; Old Nubian New Testament text (Revelations 14:6) recto and verso. Very clear black text with red diacriticals added.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), 'Scattered in a few centimetres of dust overlying the pavement of the nave of the cathedral of St Mary the Virgin'.
Curator's comments: Published: Plumley and Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim I, 36-9, pl. 8
Bibliographic references: Bierbrier 1999 / Coptic antiquities in the Department of Egyptian Antiquities, British Museum (p.89)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Parchment Iron gall ink Pigments Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
